languages.text: Камень на пьедестале, без сомнения, твердый, однако его поверхность переливается и меняет оттенок — словно кто-то замкнул в пространстве кусочек неспокойного океана.

traits.locale_text: [DRAFT] Барк про экспонаты в фое — голубой светящийся кусок (как будто вечно замерзшая флорисцентная жидкость)

languages.text: The stone on the pedestal is no doubt solid, but its surface shimmers and changes hue — as if someone has captured a piece of turbulent sea within the rock.
languages.original_text: Камень на пьедестале, без сомнения, твердый, однако его поверхность переливается и меняет оттенок — словно кто-то замкнул в пространстве кусочек неспокойного океана.

traits.locale_text: The stone on the pedestal is no doubt solid, but its surface shimmers and changes hue — as if someone has captured a piece of turbulent sea within the rock.
The stone on the pedestal is no doubt solid, but its surface shimmers and changes hue — as if someone has captured a piece of turbulent sea within the rock.
The stone on the pedestal is no doubt solid, but its surface shimmers and changes hue — as if someone has captured a piece of turbulent sea within the rock.

languages.text: 毫无疑问，基座上的石头是实心的，但石头表面却泛着光，色调也在不断发生变化，仿佛石头中蕴含着一片波涛汹涌的大海。
languages.original_text: The stone on the pedestal is no doubt solid, but its surface shimmers and changes hue — as if someone has captured a piece of turbulent sea within the rock.

traits.locale_text: 毫无疑问，基座上的石头是实心的，但石头表面却泛着光，色调也在不断发生变化，仿佛石头中蕴含着一片波涛汹涌的大海。

languages.text: La piedra del pedestal es claramente sólida, pero su superficie brilla y cambia de color, como si alguien hubiera capturado una porción de mar turbulento en el interior de la roca.
languages.original_text: The stone on the pedestal is no doubt solid, but its surface shimmers and changes hue — as if someone has captured a piece of turbulent sea within the rock.

traits.locale_text: La piedra del pedestal es claramente sólida, pero su superficie brilla y cambia de color, como si alguien hubiera capturado una porción de mar turbulento en el interior de la roca.

languages.text: 台座上の石は間違いなく固体だが、その表面はゆらめき、色合いが変化する。荒れ狂う海の一部を捉えて岩の中に閉じ込めたかのようだ。
languages.original_text: The stone on the pedestal is no doubt solid, but its surface shimmers and changes hue — as if someone has captured a piece of turbulent sea within the rock.

traits.locale_text: 台座上の石は間違いなく固体だが、その表面はゆらめき、色合いが変化する。荒れ狂う海の一部を捉えて岩の中に閉じ込めたかのようだ。
台座上の石は間違いなく固体だが、その表面はゆらめき、色合いが変化する。荒れ狂う海の一部を捉えて岩の中に閉じ込めたかのようだ。

languages.text: La pierre sur le piédestal est indéniablement solide, mais sa surface miroite et change de couleur, comme si quelqu'un avait capturé un échantillon de mer agitée à l'intérieur.
languages.original_text: The stone on the pedestal is no doubt solid, but its surface shimmers and changes hue — as if someone has captured a piece of turbulent sea within the rock.

traits.locale_text: La pierre sur le piédestal est indéniablement solide, mais sa surface miroite et change de couleur, comme si quelqu'un avait capturé un échantillon de mer agitée à l'intérieur.

languages.text: Der Stein auf dem Sockel ist zweifellos massiv, aber seine Oberfläche schimmert und ändert den Farbton – als hätte jemand ein Stück unruhige See im Inneren eingefangen.
languages.original_text: The stone on the pedestal is no doubt solid, but its surface shimmers and changes hue — as if someone has captured a piece of turbulent sea within the rock.

traits.locale_text: Der Stein auf dem Sockel ist zweifellos massiv, aber seine Oberfläche schimmert und ändert den Farbton – als hätte jemand ein Stück unruhige See im Inneren eingefangen.

languages.text: Kaidede duran taşın katı bir madde olduğu su götürmez bir gerçek. Yine de yüzeyi parıldıyor, renkten renge giriyor. Sanki birileri fırtınalı bir denizden parça koparıp taşa hapsetmiş.
languages.original_text: The stone on the pedestal is no doubt solid, but its surface shimmers and changes hue — as if someone has captured a piece of turbulent sea within the rock.

traits.locale_text: Kaidede duran taşın katı bir madde olduğu su götürmez bir gerçek. Yine de yüzeyi parıldıyor, renkten renge giriyor. Sanki birileri fırtınalı bir denizden parça koparıp taşa hapsetmiş.
